cleaned_text: Asthma, allergy and immunology evaluations include a complete medical history, directed physical exam and appropriate testing. These tests may be part of your evaluation: Virginia Mason Franciscan Health provides on-site laboratory and radiology services. On-site specialist referrals also are available, including pulmonary physicians and ear, nose and throat physicians.
